officialTitle: The Safety and Efficacy of Epidural Oxycodone
inclusionCriteria:
* Planned gynecological lower abdomen surgery with epidural pain treatment
* Informed consent obtained
* Must be FEMALE
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 75 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Planned surgery under regional anesthesia
* contraindication to the study drug
* contraindication to the lumbar puncture
* Contraindication to oxycodone
* Pregnancy or lactation
* no informed consent
